mapper.select:
select uc.*, c.name as name,c.type as type, c.tags as tags, c.discount as discount, c.condition_amount as conditionAmount, c.reduce_amount as reduceAmount from user_coupon uc left join coupon c on uc.coupon_id = c.id where user_id = #{userId} and uc.status = #{status}
and uc.start_time <= NOW()
and uc.end_time >= NOW()
order by uc.receive_time desc
